original_text: But look! He is speaking to the crowds, and the leaders are not saying anything against him! Perhaps they really think that he is the Messiah!
korean_text: 보라 드러나게 말하되 그들이 아무 말도 아니하는도다 당국자들은 이 사람을 참으로 그리스도인 줄 알았는가

sentences.original_text: He is speaking to the crowds,
and the leaders are not saying anything against him!
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 지도자들은 그를 반대하여 아무 말도 하지 않고 있습니다!
